entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Good Hope Airport 1:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
